Feature: Preview mode that pauses database connection
Option to show all questions on one page
Time stamps of each question and page interaction
Form validation: limit input based on question type
A top progress bar with your theme color

How to Trigger: In your YAML header, type barposition = "top" or "bottom".
By inputting the url parameters the users can go to the desired page

Feature: Markdown capability for options and buttons
How to Trigger: Just use markdown on options and buttons.
Define an xxx.scss file and use theme = xxx.scss in your YAML header.
